channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【EP146: The Open Source AI Stack】EP146：开源人工智能堆栈
item.description: 【You don’t need to spend a fortune to build an AI application.】你不需要花一大笔钱来构建人工智能应用程序。

item.title: 【Understanding Message Queues】了解消息队列
item.description: 【Asynchronous communication has become an important strategy for modern software systems, particularly in distributed and large-scale applications.】异步通信已成为现代软件系统的重要策略，特别是在分布式和大规模应用程序中。

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Scaled User Restriction System to 5 Million Queries Per Second】LinkedIn 如何将用户限制系统扩展到每秒 500 万次查询
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the LinkedIn Engineering Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 LinkedIn 工程博客。

item.title: 【Kubernetes Made Easy: A Beginner’s Roadmap to Container Orchestration】Kubernetes 让一切变得简单：容器编排初学者路线图
item.description: 【Containers, led by technologies like Docker, offer a lightweight, portable, and consistent way to package applications and their dependencies.】以 Docker 等技术为主导的容器提供了一种轻量级、可移植且一致的方式来打包应用程序及其依赖项。

item.title: 【How Uber Unified Checkouts Across Billion-Dollar Business Lines】Uber 如何在数十亿美元的业务范围内统一结账
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the Uber Engineering Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 Uber 工程博客。

item.title: 【From Monolith to Microservices: Key Transition Patterns】从整体架构到微服务：关键转换模式
item.description: 【Monolithic architecture is a software development approach in which the entire application is built as a single, unified codebase.】整体架构是一种软件开发方法，其中整个应用程序构建为单个统一的代码库。
